name: Sheila Bridges
biography: Bridges, originally from Philadelphia, has a degree from Parsons School of Design and studied decorative arts at Polimoda, in Florence Italy. Today she runs her design firm our of Harlem, which she launched in 1994. Her home furnishings, furniture, and wallpaper collections have become well known around the United States, particularly after she hosted four seasons of a television series, offering advice on DIY design.
